meanings.definition: The person whose signature appears below.
meanings.sent1: The undersigned on the contract is the person who signed at the bottom.
meanings.sent2: Please provide identification for the undersigned on the form.
meanings.sent3: The undersigned at the end of the letter was eager to show their approval.
meanings.sent4: The undersigned on the will held the key to the family's future.
meanings.sent5: The undersigned in the agreement was the final piece needed for completion.

meanings.definition: To sign one's name at the end of a document.
meanings.sent1: I undersigned the check before handing it over to the cashier.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to undersign the form before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The student eagerly undersigned their test paper, relieved it was finally over.
meanings.sent4: She undersigned the contract, sealing the deal with a flourish.
meanings.sent5: The artist undersigned their masterpiece, marking it as their own creation.
